_header: The grace of God full of might
_description: The Fall and Passion — in quatrains

BLHar913.First Lines:
þe grace of god ful of miȝt þat is king and euer
                    wasMote amang vs aliȝt and ȝiue vs alle is swete
                    grace…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…þer after he steiȝ to heuen aboue þer ioi is
                    þat euer lestAn þer he sal al vs loue in his swet blisful
                    fest
BLHar913.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James. 
             Early English Poems and Lives of Saints.
Transactions of the London Philological Society
         1858; Pt. 2, Berlin, 1862: 12-15.
Mätzner,  Edouard Adolf Ferdinand. 
             Altenglische Sprachproben, I: Poesie.
         Berlin: Wiedmann, 1867: 1.124.
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             Die Kildare-Gedichte…
Bonner Beiträge zur Anglistik
         14. Bonn: P. Hanstein, 1904: 106-12.
